meanings: (뒤쫓다) pursue, chase (after), run after, (흔적·증거 등을 이용해서) trail, track
[돌려보내다] drive back [out], [방문자 등을] send away, turn from the door.

vlive.korean: 그래서 알아보려고 저도 쫓아나간 거겠죠? So I guess I'm chasing after her to get to know her better? 듣기 View video BTOB : 비투비 - 비트콤 #96 (프니엘 'FLY23' M/V 비하인드)
vlive.english: So I guess I'm chasing after her to get to know her better?

vlive.korean: [기존에 들어왔던 일렉트로닉보다 부드러운 비트의 노래] 이 사람 어떻게 다 쫓아요? How do we chase all of these people? 듣기 View video MOMO X : [배틀 플레이리스트] PC방에서 전투력 올리는 플레이리스트 드림캐쳐 시연&유현 편
vlive.english: How do we chase all of these people?

vlive.korean: 그런데 그건 잠은 쫓아 낼수 있어도 너무 괴롭잖아요. - 그렇죠. That might help you not be tired but it's so painful. - Yes. 듣기 View video NU'EST : [NU'EST W] 뉴블의 심야식당 - 오늘을 읽어주는 남자들 part.4
vlive.english: That might help you not be tired but it's so painful. - Yes.

vlive.korean: 아무리 잠을 쫓아보려고 해도 감기는 눈꺼풀을 막을 순 없는 모양이다. No matter how hard she tries to stay away, she can't help her eyelids that keep drooping. 듣기 View video MOMO X : [아큐멘터리] 예쁨주의보 채원에 빠지다 에이프릴 '채원' 1부
vlive.english: No matter how hard she tries to stay away, she can't help her eyelids that keep drooping.

vlive.korean: 아직도 쫓아댕겨? You still follow them? 듣기 View video MAMAMOO : 소문난 별다방 세 번째 잔

examples.korean: She brushed the fly away. 듣기 Add to Wordbook 그녀가 파리를 쫓아 버렸다. Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary
examples.english: She brushed the fly away. Add to Wordbook

examples.korean: With a cry of ‘Stop thief!’ he ran after the boy. 듣기 Add to Wordbook “도둑 잡아라!”하고 고함을 지르며 그가 그 소년을 쫓아 달려갔다. Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary
examples.english: With a cry of ‘Stop thief!’ he ran after the boy. Add to Wordbook

examples.korean: They had nowhere to stay so I couldn’t turn them away. 듣기 Add to Wordbook 그들은 머물 곳이 아무데도 없어서 내가 그들을 쫓아 보낼 수가 없었다. Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary
examples.english: They had nowhere to stay so I couldn’t turn them away. Add to Wordbook

examples.korean: put a person off with fair promises 듣기 Add to Wordbook 듣기 좋은 말로 남을 쫓아 버리다. Friendict Level English-Korean Dictionary
examples.english: put a person off with fair promises Add to Wordbook

examples.korean: banish a person from [out of] one's presence 듣기 Add to Wordbook 아무를 면전에서 쫓아 버리다. Friendict Level English-Korean Dictionary
